text:
[Verse]
Whispers in the night
Echoes softly sing
Dreams are taking flight
Carried by the wind

[Verse 2]
Stars are shining bright
Painting skies so wide
In this quiet light
Heartbeats coincide

[Chorus]
Echoes in the wind
Calling out my name
Voices start to blend
Never sound the same

[Verse 3]
Moonlight on the sea
Waves are dancing slow
Feel so wild and free
As the currents flow

[Bridge]
Memories unfold
Drifting on the breeze
Stories that we told
Woven through the trees

[Chorus]
Echoes in the wind
Calling out my name
Voices start to blend
Never sound the same
title: Echoes in the Wind
